cleaned_text: You may be going through a spiritual awakening or would like to induce a spiritual awakening. Either way, these 11 magical foods and herbs for spiritual awakening will increase the likelihood you'll have a spiritual awakening experience and strengthen your connection to the Divine. While I was spiritually awakening after a long battle with addiction, I had a near-death experience. As my boyfriend revived me, my ears crackled and rang loudly from the blood rushing back into them so suddenly. Soon after, I learned I was [clairaudient](https://strengthessence.com/clairaudient/) (psychic hearing). I followed my spirit guide's and angel's messages of how to spiritually awaken, and these were the spiritual herbs for awakening that were told to me over and over and over! You can read more about [My Spiritual Awakening Recovery Book](https://www.amazon.com/Spiritual-Awakening-Recovery-Addiction-Spiritually-ebook/dp/B08MNFQNHC/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=my+spiritual+awakening+recovery&qid=1613966210&sr=8-2): (How I Overcame Grief & Addiction to Spiritually Awaken & Create My Own Reality!) As an Amazon Associate, I earn from qualifying purchases." 11 MAGICAL Herbs for Spiritual Awakening Table of Contents The following list of 11 magical foods and herbs for spiritual awakening is not an exhaustive list by any means, and also not every item is technically an herb. However, if you are looking to clear old energies, strengthen your intuition, [reach higher planes of consciousness](https://strengthessence.com/secrets-reaching-higher-consciousness/), and get a magical spiritual awakening assist with herbs, foods, and supplements - These are for you! Please use these spiritual herbs with reverence, intention, and a clear purpose of spiritually awakening and reconnecting to your Divinity within. 1. [Yerba Mate](https://www.amazon.com/ECOTEAS-Organic-Yerba-Mate-Unsmoked/dp/B07Y5KZNVV?dchild=1&keywords=yerba+mate&qid=1613968287&sr=8-15&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=56e86aedad4de0bfcdb580775f6c43a2&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) Starting with my favorite herb for spiritual awakening, is the enlightening yerba mate. I was first introduced to the magical, beautiful yerba mate during my particularly difficult and [rare spiritual awakening](https://strengthessence.com/spiritual-awakening-signs/) by my spirit guides and instantly felt better after drinking it. My nerves were calmed, my racing mind was clearer, and my mood instantly improved. Since then, my spirit guides have told me that Yerba Mate is a "Master Teacher" and helps to "uplift" and "enlighten". My favorite method for consuming this spiritual awakening herb is in [Organic Yerba Mate Tea](https://www.amazon.com/Wisdom-Ancients-Organic-Yerba-Ounce/dp/B00C9UO7YY?dchild=1&keywords=yerba+mate+tea&qid=1613967960&sr=8-26&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=e4c1fc46eac9591fbbbe8ab80472bbeb&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) with [Organic Almond Milk](https://www.amazon.com/Kirkland-Signature-Organic-Almond-Beverage/dp/B07HL1NRGQ?dchild=1&keywords=organic+almond+milk&qid=1613968165&sr=8-8&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=a1172fc2625918e48e2e4bb3094bed8c&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) and [Raw Organic Honey](https://www.amazon.com/Nature-Nates-Unfiltered-Brazilian-Wholesome/dp/B01IR6J4CI?dchild=1&keywords=raw+organic+honey&qid=1613968234&sr=8-6&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=2624bf294275abeef6a053ac39f12c07&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl). 2. [Lavender](https://www.amazon.com/Organic-Lavender-Flowers-Extra-Grade/dp/B01BTNMGXU?dchild=1&keywords=lavender&qid=1613969540&sr=8-3&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=c2f8cafe8ecdfdb0a73ac80e2048a5c8&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) I've included lavender on this list of spiritual awakening herbs because it holds an extremely high vibration of love and purity. Besides calming the nervous system, lavender connects me to my spirit guides and angels in a very strong way, because I am matching their vibration when I use it. My favorite method for using lavender is ingesting it in this amazing super-bioavailable [Organic Lavender Extract](https://www.amazon.com/Alcohol-FREE-Lavandula-Angustifolia-Glycerite-Supplement/dp/B01A3PAUJ2?dchild=1&keywords=organic+lavender+extract&qid=1613968925&sr=8-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=3b6d8417036125097f2ae4eaee4c6884&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) or an [Organic Lavender Tea](https://www.amazon.com/Tao-Tea-Lavender-Herbal-Loose/dp/B00EVJURRM?dchild=1&keywords=organic+lavender+tea&qid=1613968997&sr=8-10&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=7769235f1d1e73580e4751953dc5262a&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl). But, [Organic Lavender Essential Oil](https://www.amazon.com/Plant-Therapy-Essential-Undiluted-Therapeutic/dp/B00LABX3DY?dchild=1&keywords=organic+lavender&qid=1613968429&sr=8-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=ace5ad6f0e7b062e0f0b3ea6d9a3ca0f&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) can also be used in an Essential Oil Diffuser like this [Cool 2-in-1 Himalayan Salt Diffuser](https://www.amazon.com/Pure-Enrichment-PureGlow-Crystal-Handcrafted/dp/B078SZ5RN5?dchild=1&keywords=himalayan+salt+diffuser&qid=1613969146&sr=8-5&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=76f4d1a30bb04020b7c4b2b8471bf868&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl), or applied to the body with a carrier oil, such as this great [Squeezable Organic Coconut Oil](https://www.amazon.com/Nutiva-Organic-Unrefined-Squeezable-12-ounce/dp/B07PR2F561?dchild=1&keywords=squeezable+organic+coconut+oil&qid=1613969269&sr=8-5&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=1144926f043ca9898cbf7a728e2ca038&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) (I can squeeze out just like lotion!). Always use a carrier oil when applying essential oils to the skin! They are very strong! 3. [Whole Life-Cycle Mushrooms](https://www.amazon.com/New-Chapter-Reishi-Mushroom-Ingredients/dp/B0038ZYGD6?keywords=New+Chapter+immune&qid=1561443532&s=gateway&sr=8-3&th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=84d16e231a0534146f072a2d1cbbbd0d&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) During my spiritual awakening, I was given the guidance to eat more mushrooms to help me with awakening, particularly [Opening my Third Eye Chakra](https://strengthessence.com/how-to-open-your-third-eye/). You don't have to get "magic mushrooms" with psilocybin to have spiritual experiences! My spirit guides instructed me to use whole life-cycle mushrooms to assist with spiritual awakening. Whole life-cycle mushrooms are blends of mushrooms that contain ground up parts of all the cycles the mushrooms go through including: the mycelium, primordia, fruitbodies, and extracellular compounds produced throughout the entire life cycle of the mushroom. These mushrooms naturally contain beta glucans, digestive enzymes, fiber, prebiotics and antioxidants! While researching this, I found two incredible companies on the internet making whole life-cycle mushrooms, New Chapter and Om. I've personally used and loooove both brands! [New Chapter LifeShield Immune Support](https://www.amazon.com/New-Chapter-Reishi-Mushroom-Ingredients/dp/B0038ZYGD6?keywords=New+Chapter+immune&qid=1561443532&s=gateway&sr=8-3&th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=5821615860efb4fe1b193f7c991c084d&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) comes in pill form and contains the whole life-cycles of 7 mushroom types. [Om Organic Mushroom Nutrition Immune Powder](https://www.amazon.com/Om-Organic-Mushroom-Nutrition-Supplement/dp/B00MY4OH7W/ref=as_li_ss_tl?crid=3NSS84IJTCU49&keywords=om+immune+organic+mushroom+powder&qid=1561443632&s=gateway&sprefix=om+imm,aps,211&sr=8-3&th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=93d0a8d8b519994e78248568218771f5&language=en_US) is cheaper per serving and virtually tasteless when mixed with water. It is great in soup, smoothies, tea, or coffee! Their mushrooms are also ID tested and carefully grown! If you don't love supplements, you can simply eat more mushrooms to help with spiritual awakening, but you won't be getting the whole-life cycle mushroom. 4. [Yarrow Flower](https://www.amazon.com/Organic-Yarrow-Tea-Caffeine-Free-Bleach-Free/dp/B00QMO2RJU?dchild=1&keywords=organic+yarrow+root&qid=1614028757&sr=8-10&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=12246e25f1922919cddf0774d846c1ad&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) Yarrow is a superstar herb for spiritual awakening. This magical aromatic wildflower assists with [Lucid Dreaming](https://strengthessence.com/lucid-dreams/) and [Astral Projection](https://strengthessence.com/astral-projection/) and can help you [Remember Your Dreams](https://strengthessence.com/remember-dreams/) to retain their spiritual awakening lessens. You can brew some [Organic Yarrow Flower Tea](https://www.amazon.com/Organic-Yarrow-Tea-Caffeine-Free-Bleach-Free/dp/B00QMO2RJU?dchild=1&keywords=organic+yarrow+root&qid=1614028757&sr=8-10&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=12246e25f1922919cddf0774d846c1ad&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) before meditation or bed to help you have the spiritual awakening experiences you seek. 5. [Iron](https://www.amazon.com/Garden-mykind-Organics-Organic-Plant-Sourced/dp/B018KVB3BK?dchild=1&keywords=garden+of+life+iron&qid=1614029312&sr=8-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=e6e426685a19333a8abdfff3c55e55b0&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) Included in my [5 Magic Hacks for Reaching Higher States of Consciousness](https://strengthessence.com/secrets-reaching-higher-consciousness/) post, iron is an incredible way to "turn on" and "tune in". I began taking iron while I was pregnant and noticed some incredible spiritual awakening experiences. My intuition was heightened. I sensed more with my clairaudience, [Clairvoyance](https://strengthessence.com/clairvoyant/), [Claircognizance](https://strengthessence.com/claircognizant/), and [Clairsentience](https://strengthessence.com/clairsentient/). My guides told me "iron turns us on and tunes us in". I'm guessing it's because iron circulates more oxygen through the bloodstream, and oxygen contains the "Infinite Intelligence of Creator". I often take this [Organic Plant-Based Liquid Iron](https://www.amazon.com/Garden-mykind-Organics-Organic-Plant-Sourced/dp/B018KVB3BK?dchild=1&keywords=garden+of+life+iron&qid=1614029312&sr=8-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=e6e426685a19333a8abdfff3c55e55b0&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) before writing, channeling, and meditating to help receive more Divine guidance as I do so. 6. [Raw Cacao](https://www.amazon.com/Milliard-Organic-Powder-Non-GMO-Gluten/dp/B07SQB7ZJN?dchild=1&keywords=organic+cacao&qid=1614030610&sr=8-8&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=ffa0c73ca663eaafad55d95f49286232&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) Often used for ceremonial purposes, raw cacao strengthens your spiritual sight and helps you go deeper into meditation, channeling, and Shamanic work. [Sananga](https://psychedelictimes.com/the-long-burn-a-30-day-sananga-challenge/) Sananga is a potent, and when I say potent, I mean very powerful and to be used in moderation eye medicine made from a shrub found in the Rain Forest. I recently had the opportunity to try sananga as one of a few cleansing herbs for spiritual awakening on a spiritual healing retreat to Moab, Utah. My spirit guides explained that it is "potent" and very "energetically cleansing" for spiritual awakening. Sananga eye drops however, are not for the faint of heart as they burn and sting your eyes for 10 - 15 minutes. Sananga has been said to help open the third eye chakra and many report "seeing" a lot of psychic information upon using them. However, I didn't experience any third eye visuals while using sananga. But, I have noticed an increase in ease, joy, and clarity since trying it. Sananga is less readily available than other foods and herbs for spiritual awakening, but can be [purchased here](https://psychedelictimes.com/the-long-burn-a-30-day-sananga-challenge/). 10. [Mucuna](https://www.amazon.com/Maximum-Strength-Organic-Mucuna-Pruriens/dp/B01BHF3J4K?dchild=1&keywords=mucana&qid=1613964039&sr=8-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=7e5c2abb9a0854d41e3d247ccfaaff49&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) One of the most incredible herbs for spiritual awakening is mucuna. Grown in jungle regions near the equator, mucuna comes from the velvet bean plant and contains high levels of L-Dopa, a precursor to dopamine. This helps mucuna stabilize and improve your mood, but it also contains trace levels of DMT, which is an active ingredient in ayahuasca and peyote. These lower levels of DMT (produced by the pineal gland), make it safe to consume without having the adverse reactions many report from plants such as ayahuasca and peyote. The pineal gland has been called "The Seat of the Soul" and contains vast amounts of information important in the spiritual awakening process. It is considered by many to be a "second spiritual eye" after the third-eye chakra, which is also used for spiritual sight. Although mucuna is not classified as a psychoactive or psychedelic plant (since the levels of DMT are minute), it is still considered a powerful spiritual awakening herb and consciousness expanding plant medicine. [Organic Mucuna Powder](https://www.amazon.com/Maximum-Strength-Organic-Mucuna-Pruriens/dp/B01BHF3J4K?dchild=1&keywords=mucana&qid=1613964039&sr=8-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=7e5c2abb9a0854d41e3d247ccfaaff49&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) is readily available on Amazon and also in many local health food stores. It can be mixed into a ceremonial tea, or added to soups or smoothies for an energy and anti-inflammatory boost as well. 11. My guides remind me to eat [Raw Organic Honey](https://www.amazon.com/Nature-Nates-Unfiltered-Brazilian-Wholesome/dp/B01IR6J4CI?dchild=1&keywords=raw+organic+honey&qid=1614034806&sr=8-11&linkCode=ll1&tag=strengthess07-20&linkId=506056716b5e40d62362c7f3d4dbffae&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) all the time and often say "Honey is money for spiritual awakening!"
